{{also|wieviel}} ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|wieviel}} {{qualifier|superseded in 1996, but still common}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˌviːˈfiːl/|/ˈviːˌfiːl/}} * {{audio|de|De-wie viel.oga|Audio}} ===Determiner=== {{head|de|determiner}} # [[how much]]; [[how many]] ====Declension==== * See {{m|de|viel}}. ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|wievielter}} ===Adverb=== {{de-adv|head=[[wie]] [[viel]]}} # {{lb|de|fairly|_|rare}} [[how much]]; how often ====Usage notes==== * Used in some contexts, but more often {{m|de|wie sehr}} (asking for intensity) or {{m|de|wie oft}} (asking for frequence).
